StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetCandidateHistory]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@PersonID int AS
SELECT P.LAST_NAME + ', ' + P.FIRST_NAME + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, SPACE(0)) AS PERSON_NAME, P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER, RS.NAME AS RS_NAME, RSS.NAME AS RSS_NAME, SD.STATUS_DESCRIPTION, SD.DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION, CONVERT(CHAR(11), CS.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE, 106) AS STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE FROM PERSON P INNER JOIN NWA N ON (P.PERSON_ID = N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AND P.PERSON_ID = @PersonID) INNER JOIN CANDIDATE_STATUS CS ON N.NWA_ID = CS.NWA_ID INNER JOIN STATUS_DISPOSITION SD ON (CS.STATUS_TYPE = SD.STATUS_TYPE AND CS.STATUS_CODE = SD.STATUS_CODE AND CS.DISPOSITION_CODE = SD.DISPOSITION_CODE) INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RSS ON N.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = RSS.ORGANIZATION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP OM ON RSS.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RS ON OM.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = RS.ORGANIZATION_ID ORDER BY CS.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID DESC
